The Museum of Ancient Ships is a museum in Pisa, Tuscany, Italy.
The museum exhibits ancient ships and artifacts.
The exhibition space is within the ancient halls of the Medici Arsenals.
Some museum items
File:05 BarcaF 03.jpg|An ancient boat
File:Ancora in ferro, dal cantiere delle navi di pisa, I-II secolo dc.jpg|An ancient anchor
File:Passerella in legno e ferro dalla nave ellenistica, II secolo ac., dal cantire delle navi a pisa.jpg|An ancient walkway
File:Alkedo, nave militare riutilizzata come da diporto, ricostruzione 03.jpg|Replica of the shipwreck Alkedo
